application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: 1 x cherry (T1): Reduce lateral spread away from property by 1.5 m; crown lift to 3 m. Remove any dead and defective branchwood.1 x London plane (T2): crown lift to allow 3.5 m clearance from ground level. Remove any dead and defective branchwood.1 x lime (T3): crown tidy by reducing longest over-extended branches by up to 1.5 m; to bring into a tidy and uniform shape. Crown lift to 3.5 m. Remove any dead and defective branchwood.1 x lime (T4): Overall reduction up to 2 m within most recent reduction framework; maintain live growth points to retain natural flowing canopy outline. Crown lift to 3.5 m. Remove any dead and defective branchwood.1 x cherry (T5): Crown tidy by reducing longest over-extended branches by up to 2 m to bring into a tidy and uniform shape; crown lift to 3.5metres; remove any dead and defective branchwood.1 x London plane (T6): crown reduce to previous most recent reduction points.
decision_conditions: work in accordance with British Standard
